adjectives.description: butcherly (comparative more butcherly, superlative most butcherly)

entries.meaning: Like a butcher; characterised by slaughter, savage.
examples: She had not realised how butcherly the severed vessels would look, and she had not reckoned with the horrid halitus of blood, which steamed to her nostrils under the blazing sun.

adverbs.description: butcherly (comparative more butcherly, superlative most butcherly)
